titleStmt.title: Cono-cuneus, or, The shipwright's circular wedge that is, a body resembling in part a conus, in part a cuneus, geometrically considered / by John Wallis ..., in a letter to the honourable Sir Robert Moray ...
titleStmt.author: Wallis, John, 1616-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Playford for Richard Davis ...,

notesStmt.note: This item also apears at reel 854:14 as part of Wing W613: A treatise of algebra. London, 1685.
